message: There's no one here.
Looks like Thomas and Nai have already gone home.
Even so......
What on earth was that conversation between those two about earlier?
Did Thomas come to Arkham looking for something, and does Nai have a clue about that 'something'？

name: Thomas
message: Why the hell are you talking in such a roundabout way！
You dragged me all the way out to a place like this......

name: Nai
message: It's not like I asked you to come.
Isn't it just that you followed orders from up top, right？

name: Nai
message: Yeah, it wasn't your own will.
You shouldn't have the authority to do something like that.

name: Thomas
message: What the hell...... you bastard！
Isn't that Thomas over there?
And that towering Black man standing by his side is Nai.
They look like they're arguing about something, but I can't really hear them from here.
Luckily, neither of them seems to have noticed me.
I don't see anyone else moving besides me.
It feels like the usual silence has returned to the area.
Thomas and Nai are already gone.
The church and its surroundings look like they've returned to their usual silence.
There's no light to be seen at Nai's church.
So, I wonder if Thomas went back to the Fish Scale Inn.
This is Nai's church.
Looks like there aren’t any devoted believers visiting this late at night.
No matter how many times I look, this church has a slightly different vibe from a regular one.
What's most bizarre is that there isn't a single bit of decoration typical for churches here, starting with the cross.
The decorative plaster spread over the random-rubble stone walls is cracked and peeling here and there after all the wind and snow, exposing the insides made up of different sized stones.
There's a relief displayed here with exactly the same design as Thomas's ring.
Is Nai part of the same secret society as Thomas？
There's a relief displayed here with exactly the same design as Thomas's ring.
The conversation between the two earlier, and now this mysterious coincidence...
I can't help but think there's some sort of connection between Thomas and Nai.
Maybe Nai's also a member of the same secret society.
Looks like someone’s pretty pissed off.
If it were an average guy, that look alone would make him shrink back, but Nai doesn't seem fazed at all.
Usually, he's a guy who hardly ever shows a serious face, but for some reason, he seems really pissed off right now.
He looks like he's about to lunge at Nai any second, but standing in front of Nai, who's like a mountain even taller than the tall Thomas, he doesn't really seem all that intimidating.
Still, I wonder why I'm getting so worked up like this.
She doesn't seem fazed at all, even with Thomas showing his anger.
Like this, Thomas will probably just be spinning his wheels, getting nowhere at all.
Facing Thomas, who looked like he was about to pounce any second, she kept her usual calm, cool expression.
Apparently, this guy doesn't show much emotion.
Or is it just that from the start, they’ve already decided Thomas is beneath them and aren’t even bothering to take him seriously?

name: Thomas
message: Anyway, if what you guys are talking about... isn't the 'final key', then you'd better be ready for what's coming.

name: Thomas
message: Cut it out already！
I don't wanna hear your bullshit in the middle of the fucking night.

name: Thomas
message: You bastards might think you can do whatever the hell you want out in the boonies like this, but you do know what'll happen if I contact someone on the outside, right？

name: Nai
message: That's pretty gutsy of you......
How are you planning to contact the outside？

name: Nai
message: Do you have the guts to cross that suspension bridge？

name: Nai
message: You guys can't take a single step out of this village, and there's neither a phone nor radio in this village.

name: Thomas
message: No way......
You didn't mess with the bridge on purpose for that, did you?

name: Nai
message: There's no need to do something like that.
That bridge has been left abandoned for more than ten years.

name: Thomas
message: I wish that were true......
If you're trying to screw me over, you're not getting away with it.

name: Thomas
message: How long do you expect me to go along with this half-assed crap?
I'm leaving the village as soon as tomorrow.

name: Nai
message: Oh, and how's that?
Do you have the guts to cross that suspension bridge？

name: Thomas
message: Don't mess with me.
I've been in way more dangerous situations before.

name: Nai
message: Even so, you wouldn't go.
I've never seen anyone as greedy as you.

name: Thomas
message: What did you say......

name: Nai
message: Even if you happened to find the 'Lost key', would you go and report it or something？

name: Nai
message: Even if you got your hands on some unbelievably immense power, you wouldn't be such a good person as to share it with your comrades, would you？

name: Thomas
message: That's something to think about after you find it.

name: Thomas
message: Can't be helped, I'll wait a little longer for you.

name: Nai
message: I figured you'd say that.
Anyway, just make sure you stay away from that guy Jonathan.

name: Thomas
message: Is that bastard really that important？
He's just some spoiled rich kid.

name: Nai
message: That guy's definitely a descendant of the 'Pactmaker'.
There's no doubt this is the one we've been waiting for over a hundred years.

name: Nai
message: Just go already.
The two disappeared into the darkness.
I was surprised when my name came up at the end though......
I wonder what kind of scheming those two are plotting.
What do I even mean to them......

name: Nai
message: It'd be a problem if they started thinking we're being uncooperative with the Organization.
There's absolutely no guarantee that what we're after is the 'Lost key' in the first place.

name: Thomas
message: This isn't what we agreed on.
You kept leading me on with all those teasing words！

name: Nai
message: You guys are just way too short-tempered, honestly.

name: Nai
message: We've been waiting for a hundred years, you know.
If you're really planning to find the so-called 'Lost key', you'd better take your time with it.

name: Thomas
message: Tch, like I can wait that long.

name: Nai
message: There's nothing we can do about it.
We just have to wait until then.

name: Thomas
message: What the hell.
Even though it might just be a bullshit story.

name: Thomas
message: Why the hell do I gotta go along with such a pie-in-the-sky story?
Map
